translations.translation: But as for anyone who turns away and is kafir,
Other than him who turns his back and denies,
But whoever will turn away (from the Truth),
However, those who turn away and disbelieve,
Except whoever turns away and disbelieves –
Save the one who turns away and disbelieves.
But whoever turns back and disbelieves,
But he who turns his back, and disbelieves,
But whoso is averse and disbelieveth,
But whoever turns back and denies the truth,
But whosoever will turn back and disbelieve -
except him who turns back and disbelieves.
But if any turn away and reject Allah,-
Save the one who turns away and disbelieves
As for those who turn their back and disbelieve,
But whoever turns away and disbelieves.
However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
[88:23] But he who turns away, [he who] rejects faith, and disbelieves, in the Qur’ān,
Later on, Allah commanded him to fight them, saying: (But whoso is averse and disbelieveth) except he who turns away from faith and disbelieves in Allah,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِلاَّ مَن تَوَلَّىٰ } يعني: لكن من أعرض وبغى بعد تذكيرك وتبليغك { وَكَفَرَ } [الغاشية: 23] وطغى بما سمعك منك، واستهزأ معك وكذبك
